resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103531</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103531</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206113</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bryce Canyon National Park: Hoodoos Cast Their Spell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bryce Schlucht-Nationalpark: Hoodoos Warf 
Ihren Bann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parc National de Gorge de Bryce : Hoodoos A 
moulé Leur Charme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parque Nacional Da Garganta De Bryce: 
Hoodoos Moldou Seu Período</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parco Nazionale Del Canyon Di Bryce: Hoodoos
Ha lanciato Il Loro Periodo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικό πάρκο φαραγγιών Bryce: Το Hoodoos 
πέταξε την περίοδό τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parque Nacional De la Barranca De Bryce: 
Hoodoos Echó Su Encanto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at the history of this area in Utah known for its hoodoos -- limestones, sandstones, and mudstones that have been carved by erosion into spectacular spires, fins, and pinnacles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">betrachtet die Geschichte dieses Bereiches in 
Utah, das nach seinen hoodoos -- Kalksteine, Sandsteine und Mudstones,
die, bekannt ist durch Abnutzung in großartige Helme, in 
Flossen und in Pinnacles geschnitzt worden sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regarde l'histoire de cette zone en Utah connu 
pour ses hoodoos -- calcaires, grès, et schistes qui ont été 
découpés par érosion dans les flèches, les ailerons, et les 
pinacles spectaculaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olha o history desta área em Utá conhecido para 
seus hoodoos -- pedras calcárias, sandstones, e mudstones que carved 
pela erosão em spires, em aletas, e em pinnacles espectaculares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">guarda la storia di questa zona nell'Utah 
conosciuto per i relativi hoodoos -- calcari, arenarie e mudstones che
sono stati intagliati tramite erosione negli spires, nelle alette e 
nei pinnacles spettacolari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει την ιστορία αυτής της περιοχής στο Utah 
που είναι γνωστής για τα hoodoos του -- ασβεστόλιθοι, ψαμμίτες,
και mudstones που έχουν χαραστεί από τη διάβρωση θεαματικά 
spires, τα πτερύγια, και τις πυραμίδες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mira la historia de esta área en Utah conocido 
para sus hoodoos -- piedras calizas, piedras areniscas, y los 
mudstones que han sido tallados por la erosión en spires, aletas, y 
pináculos espectaculares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206113</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103531</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bryce-canyon-national-park-hoodoos-cast-their-spell</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
